channel.title: Untraceable phones calls from Whonix
channel.description:
I need to make untraceable phone calls (receiving and outgoing) on whonix. What is the best free (paid acceptable) program for whonix that allows me to do this?
If I am not mistaking, whonix routes everything through the gateway, so would something even like skype be untraceable? Although I don't plan on using skype.
tl,dr, what untraceable voip program would you recommend installing on whonix?

item.title: Untraceable phones calls from Whonix
item.dc:creator: whonixlover2
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:2, topic:906”]Difficult topic. I advice to read documentation.

Skype specifically:

Whonix – 25 Apr 20

Voice over IP (VoIP)

Anonymous Voice over IP (VoIP). Encrypted, anonymous phone calls using the Tor Anonymity Network.

Torification of IP is unfortunately not all you need to worry about. Also other stuff such as voice recognition is problematic. Voice over IP security generally, [sane] use cases and applications, see:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VoIP[/quote]
What voip would you use? And I plan on using a soundboard, not my voice.

Read full topic
